message.content:
{"id": "49890", 
"title": "Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on Linux platform", 
"description": "Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on Linux platform.\n\nCreated attachment 25997 [details]: NioEndpoint.java and simple web application.\n\nSometimes, the server's CPU reaches 100% and remains at 100% until restarted. This issue has been reproduced with Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, and 1.6.021. It appears to be a duplicate of issue Bug 46373. It seems that the Jetty team has fixed this problem (refer to http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel). I have added some logging to NioEndpoint.java.", 
"OB": "The server's CPU reaches 100% and stays at 100% until the server is restarted.", 
"EB": "The issue occurs when running the server on Linux platform. The server's CPU usage spikes to 100% and remains at that level until the server is restarted.", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue, run the server on a Linux platform with Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, or 1.6.021. Monitor the server's CPU usage and observe that it reaches 100% and does not decrease until the server is restarted. The issue has been reported as a duplicate of Bug 46373, which has been fixed by the Jetty team. You can find details of the fix at http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel. Additionally, I have attached the NioEndpoint.java file with added logging and a simple web application for reference."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '49890', 'title': 'Bug 49890Nio Selector issue on linux platform', 'description': "Bug 49890Nio Selector issue on linux platform Created attachment 25997 [details]NioEndpoint.java and simple web applicationsometimes ,server's cpu reaches 100%,and keep 100% all the time,until restartthe server.Reproduced with java versions: 1.6.007,1.6.018, 1.6.021.It is duplicate of issue: Bug 46373.It seams that Jetty guys fixed that problem: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JETTY937?focusedCommentId=168060&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:commenttabpanel.I added some logging to NioEndpoint.java. ", 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'And it is never reproduced on windows platform.In the attach:NioEndpoint.7zpatched NioEndpoint.java (with logging)web.7zsimple web application. '}
